definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: A lecturer in the English Department has recently been refused tenure .
sentences.chinese: 英语系一名讲师最近未能获得终身职位。

sentences.english: No, to english department, please dial 244.
Hou Yiling, English literature professor at Beijing Foreign Studies University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 北京外国语大学英语系教授侯毅凌对此表示赞同。

sentences.english: The girl in red is a student of the English department.
sentences.chinese: 穿红衣服的女孩是英语系的学生。

sentences.english: Professor, Department of English, Shih Hs…
It's the only way for non-native English speakers to become fluent.
sentences.chinese: 这是非英语系国家的人能够说流利英语的唯一方法。

sentences.english: For example, the English department has collected material useful in writing papers.
sentences.chinese: 例如，英语系收集了一些有助于撰写论文的材料。

sentences.english: Could you tell me the number of the English Department?
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我英语系的电话可以吗？

sentences.english: At last the English Department has its full complement of teachers.
sentences.chinese: 英语系的教师定员终于满额了。

sentences.english: The school's English department has its full complement of teachers.
sentences.chinese: 这个学校的英语系教师已额满。

sentences.english: Well, I was an English major in the university.
sentences.chinese: 我在大学念的是英语系。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, non-English major college males and females had poor English proficiency.
sentences.chinese: 然而，非英语系的男生和女生之英语能力略显不足。

sentences.english: English major should be professional as well as an English teacher.
sentences.chinese: 英语系就该专业，英语老师也是一样。

sentences.english: Now, She is teaching English at National Huwei Senior High School.
sentences.chinese: 国立台湾师范大学英语系毕业。

sentences.english: In fact, I graduated from the English Department of Peking University four years ago.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我四年前毕业与北大的英语系。

sentences.english: A good English student engages in literary analysis of every book they read.
sentences.chinese: 一名优秀的英语系学生会乐于分析他们读的每一本书。

definition: abbr. for 北京第二外國語學院|北京第二外国语学院[Bei3 jing1 Di4 er4 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Xue2 yuan4]

pinyin: Tian1 jin1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2

definition: University of International Relations, Beijing, established in 1949
